import React from "react"; import styled from "styled-components"; const footer: React.FC = () => { const Container = styled.div` width: 100vw; display: flex; justify-content: center; `; const FlexBoxWrapper = styled.div` display: flex; justify-content: flex; flex: 1; `; const FlexBox = styled.div` display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: column; flex: 1; padding: 1.5rem; `; const ListItem = styled.li` list-style-type: none; ` const Divider = styled.div` border: 1px solid #E4E4E4; ` const Button = styled.button` &:hover { color: lightgreen; } border: none; background-color: black; color: white; ` const StyledInput = styled.input` border: none; border-bottom: 1px solid black; ` return (

SUPPORT

    FAQ Contact Us Help / Support

INFORMATION

    About Us Payment Methods Delivery Costs Returns Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Newsletter

SIGN UP FOR NEWSLETTER

 ); }; export default footer;
